players.name: Alice
memory: Diana: "I'm shocked that Charlie is dead. We need to stay calm and figure out who the mafia is among us."
Bob: "I investigated Diana last night and discovered she's the mafioso. We need to vote her out."
Bob: "Everyone, please vote for Diana. She's the mafioso based on my investigation."
Diana: "Bob, you're clearly the mafia trying to mislead us! Why accuse me without proof?"
Votes: Alice voted for Diana (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
